text: County of Bentheim () is a district (Landkreis) in Lower Saxony, Germany. The Vechte River runs from south to north through the district. == Cities and municipalities == Cities Samtgemeinden Samtgemeinden #Bad Bentheim #Nordhorn Free municipalities #Wietmarschen * 1.
